channel.title: PC to Mac on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in PC to Mac on 0x000216

item.title: We Welcome a New iMac to the Family
item.description: It’s Saturday afternoon, and I’m eagerly waiting for a delivery that seems to be taking forever. Finally, after hours of waiting, the FedEx truck arrives, carrying the item I’ve been anticipating for a week: a brand new, customized 24-inch Apple iMac. You might wonder why I’m so excited, considering it took me a year after deciding to buy a new computer to finally order it. After all, I was a dedicated Mac user for over a decade before switching to PCs ten years ago.
